metadata.title: USN-3969-1 -- wpa_supplicant and hostapd vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that wpa_supplicant and hostapd incorrectly handled unexpected fragments when using EAP-pwd. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3969-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  hostapd - 1:2.4-0ubuntu6.5 No subscription required  wpagui - 2.4-0ubuntu6.5 wpasupplicant-udeb - 2.4-0ubuntu6.5 wpasupplicant - 2.4-0ubuntu6.5 No subscription required
